ca.nengo.ui.lib.world.handlers

Class MouseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.piccolo.event.PBasicInputEventHandler
      • ca.nengo.ui.lib.world.handlers.MouseHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.umd.cs.piccolo.event.PInputEventListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MouseHandler
extends edu.umd.cs.piccolo.event.PBasicInputEventHandler
    Handles mouse events. Passes double click and mouse context button events to World Objects. Displays a frame around interactable objects as the mouse moves.
